participant_1.background:
After quitting my job, I devoted my time to raising and selling pigs.
my dog is my best friend.
i am 6 feet tall.
i love to go horseback riding.
I love wearing clothes that make me feel like I can take on the world.

participant_2.background:
I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
I enjoy spending time with my horses and riding them.
i grow the tallest sunflowers you have ever seen.
i usually catch sunfish.
I go to nature documentaries to feel like I'm experiencing nature without being limited by my disability.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
Good, thanks for asking.  What do you do for fun?
I enjoy horse back riding, being outside, and spending time with my dog.  What about you?
I love spending time with my horses, riding them, and going fishing.  I also love growing sunflowers.
That's awesome! I have always wanted to grow sunflowers, but I never have the patience.  Do you have a favorite kind of sunflower?
I love growing any type of sunflower, but the biggest ones are my favorite.  I usually grow them in my backyard.
That sounds like fun!  I bet your sunflowers are beautiful.
Thanks!  I love watching them grow.  What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy.  He's the best dog ever!  He's always happy and loves to play.
That sounds like a great dog!  I've always wanted a golden retriever.  They're so friendly.
They are!  Buddy is the perfect dog for me.  He's always up for an adventure and loves to go for walks.
Sounds like you have a great dog.  I'm jealous!
